title: AR-VR-filters
desc: The app contains a basic structure of AR-VR-filters. AR-VR-filters is a free photo and video sharing app available on iPhone and Android. People can upload photos or videos to our service and share them with their followers or with a selected group of friends.

title: Projects
desc: A repository for submitting your AR/Game Dev projects for the GDSC IGDTUW Snowscript Winter of Code programme.

title: 3D Models
desc: A repository for submitting your 3D Models for the GDSC IGDTUW Snowscript Winter of Code programme.
